General.Name: Firma Oponiarska DĘBICA SA
General.Description: Tire Company Debica S.A. manufactures and sells passenger, commercial, and truck tires under the Debica, Goodyear, Dunlop, Fulda, and Sava brands in Poland. It also offers curing bladders and membranes that are used to make tires for motorcycles, planes, passenger cars, farming vehicles, trucks, and heavy earthworks vehicles. The company sells its products through tire distributors, a franchising network, and tire service stations, as well as online stores. It also exports tires to Luxembourg, Germany, Turkey, the United States, Canada, and France. The company was formerly known as Firma Oponiarska Debica S.A. The company was founded in 1937 and is based in Debica, Poland. Tire Company Debica S.A. is a subsidiary of Goodyear S.A.
